title: [ Other - Society & Culture ] Open Question : Why do kids feel like killing themselves when they are cyberbullied?
text: Add your answer Why do kids feel like killing themselves when they are cyberbullied? I once received a death threat online. I was shocked. But I ignored it. Nothing happened. Why do kids in my generation take insults from people they never even met seriously?
